name: MediaSubscription
description: A subscription which allows a user to access media including audio, video, books, etc.
title: MediaSubscription

fields.name: authenticator
fields.title: authenticator
fields.description: The Organization responsible for authenticating the user's subscription. For example, many media apps require a cable/satellite provider to authenticate your subscription before playing media.

fields.name: expectsAcceptanceOf
fields.title: expectsAcceptanceOf
fields.description: An Offer which must be accepted before the user can perform the Action. For example, the user may need to buy a movie before being able to watch it.
